text: Cun munofiqon nazdi tu ojand, (ʙo zaʙonaşon) gūjand: «Şahodat (guvohī) medihem, ki tu harojina, pajomʙari Alloh hastī». Alʙatta, Alloh medonad, ki tu pajomʙaraş hastī va Alloh şahodat medihad, ki harojina, munofiqon durūƣgūjand (on cī ʙarojat zohir kardaand ʙo zaʙonaşon, vale dar dil kufrro pinhon doştaand)
